message: The Houthis in Yemen launched a counter-procession - in protest of the parade of flags in East Jerusalem.
More recent documentation from the Nablus Gate in East Jerusalem.
Documentation from the Nablus Gate area - the barometer of East Jerusalem.
Speakers: documentation of the singing of the Israeli national anthem at the Temple Mount shared on Palestinian channels in the last few hours.
The Lebanese report fires between Huola and Markhaba in southern Lebanon following the firing of phosphorus bombs by the IDF.

Hezbollah in an official announcement:
At 14:00 we hit the Iron Dome battery in Ramat Naftali with a guided missile.
PA Prime Minister: We are ready to operate the Rafah crossing according to the agreement from 2005 (the post-disengagement agreement - EA), on the condition that Israel withdraws from the crossing.

Residents of the Bureij refugee camp in the center of the Gaza Strip are moving west, following the activity announced by the IDF yesterday. This is despite the fact that no evacuation instruction was given by Israel.
The Lebanese are reporting large fires in Aitaroun and Maroun al-Ras in southern Lebanon as a result of IDF shelling.

Coming full circle with a Gazan writer named Kawther:
"My father was born in a tent in 1950 and died in a tent in 2024."

#tufan_alaqsa

East Jerusalem channels:

ميلشيات المستوطنين تنظم "مسيرة أعلام" تهويدية في مدينة اللد المحتلة، اليوم.

"The settler militias are organizing a 'Jewish procession' of flags in the occupied city of Lod today."

Many Arab media cite this morning's report by Israeli media according to which the government approved the recruitment of 50,000 reserve personnel, in preparation for the possibility of an escalation in the north.
The market area adjacent to the Nablus Gate in the Old City of Jerusalem.

Palestinian channels:

مستوطن يقتحم المسجد الأقصى مرتدياً أداة الصلاة اليهودية " التيفيلن"؛ لأول مرة منذ احتلاله.

"A settler invaded Al-Aqsa wearing a Jewish prayer accessory - tefillin - this is happening for the first time since the occupation of Al-Aqsa"
The Prime Minister of France welcomes President Biden who flew to France to take part in the ceremonies commemorating the 80th anniversary of the invasion of Normandy.

East Jerusalem media:
"1,119 settlers invaded Al-Aqsa since the morning hours"

The headline of the Egyptian "Al Messa'" newspaper today 57 years ago - the first day of the Six Day War:
"The Arab army is on its way to Tel Aviv..."

In the headline of another newspaper a map was attached showing how the Arab forces are surrounding the State of Israel... 

##
Even then, as today, the Arab media sold their readers tales of false victories. We all know how the Six Day War started and how it ended. 

What has changed since then are the traditional Israeli media which, instead of praising the achievements of the soldiers in battles (and there are many of them), consistently and continuously try to suppress the spirit of the people and explain that Israel is losing.

IDF activity in the Bureij area:

Yesterday, the IDF announced a ground operation in the Bureij refugee camp area in the center of the Gaza Strip.
Palestinian sources report this morning that the IDF forces have not entered the territory of the Bureij refugee camp and are now in the Makbola area in the southeast of the camp, near the border fence with Israel, where they are carrying out excavation work using engineering tools.

Graphic image, viewer discretion advised

The shooting incident in the compound of the American embassy in Lebanon👆: on the vest of the terrorist who was killed by the Lebanese army it is carelessly written:
Islamic State (ISIS)

According to some reports, he has Syrian citizenship

Commander of the Iranian Revolutionary Guards, Hossein Salami:
The Zionists should wait for a response following the assassination of Saeed Aviar (the Iranian military advisor who was killed in an attack attributed to Israel in Aleppo, Syria 👆).
The exchange of fire near the US embassy in Lebanon.

The Lebanese news network LBCI reports on a shooting that lasted nearly half an hour in the area of ​​the US Embassy in Lebanon.

Lebanese media: There was a shooting attack on the American embassy in Lebanon.  The Lebanese army managed to kill one of the attackers.  There are wounded among the security force of the American embassy.
A picture I took from a Gazan channel: thing are under control on the border with Egypt.
As part of his visit to Syria, the new Iranian foreign minister (replacing the minister who was killed in the crash) came to kiss and caress the Shiite saint A-Sayida Zainab in southern Damascus.
The Gaza news agency Shahab, which is affiliated with Hamas, publishes documentation from the "invasion of Al-Aqsa".
East Jerusalem channels: "Over 500 settlers invaded Al-Aqsa since this morning"

Kamal Khatib, the deputy head of the northern faction in the Islamic movement, calls on the masses of Israeli Arabs to urgently go to the Temple Mount, where "the settlers intend to hold the flag dance procession today"

Intensive American efforts to achieve a ceasefire in Gaza

American National Security Adviser, Jack Sullivan:

1. We are not referring to various statements in the various media regarding Hamas's response to the proposal. We are only waiting for the official answer from Hamas which will be delivered by the Qataris.

2. We continue to press the Israelis regarding an overall strategy to end the fighting.

3. We hope that Hamas will agree to the proposal as the best way to end the fighting, release the abductees and increase aid.

##
At the same time, Egyptian media are reporting the arrival in Cairo of a high-ranking Islamic Jihad delegation led by Ziyad al-Nakhalah, the movement's secretary general (who has not been seen in public for many weeks - AA).

Delegations of the Palestinian factions also arrived in Cairo, at the invitation of the Egyptian intelligence, including a delegation of the Popular Front led by the deputy secretary general Jamil Mazhar.

##
The head of the CIA William Burns will arrive in Doha, Qatar to conduct the negotiations for a close deal.
Senior American officials are also in Cairo, at the same time as the heads of the Palestinian factions are being summoned by Egyptian intelligence.

##
The US is using its weight with Turkey so that it will put pressure on senior Hamas officials to agree to the deal.

###
The Biden administration is running a massive, multi-dimensional pressure cooker to advance the proposal announced by President Biden on Friday:
Pressure on Israel, pressure in Qatar, Egypt, Turkey...
But I still don't understand what changed...
The dispute between the parties is clear and stated:

Israel wants to continue the war as a condition for accepting the offer.
Hamas wants a declaration with guarantees of a permanent ceasefire.
It's black and white.
All around there is a particularly thick American smoke that tries to square the circle and in less subtle words: to work on one of the parties so that he gives up on his very clear condition because without it there will be no deal. To this end, the new marketing campaign was launched on Friday.
In the end it boils down, as mentioned, to only one thing: the war will be stopped completely or it will be possible to renew it.

USA: yesterday the American Congress approved, with a large majority of 244 supporters against 155 opponents and 27 abstentions, a bill to impose sanctions on the ICC - the Criminal Court in The Hague following its intention to issue arrest warrants against senior Israeli officials in the context of the war in Gaza.

The bill will now be transferred to the upper house of representatives - the Senate.
It is important to note that among the 244 supporters of the law there were also 42 members of the Democratic Party, despite the opposition of Biden and the heads of the American government to the move.
The Slovenian parliament approved the decision of the Slovenian government to recognize a Palestinian state.
